name: 99+ Great Storytellers
description: The goal is to build a library of 99+ fantastic storytellers! Here's the first one.

dolls.name: Lara Croft
dolls.artStyle: adventurous like the Tomb Raider games

dolls.name: Gandalf
dolls.artStyle: fantasy like Lord of the Rings

dolls.name: The Parisian
dolls.artStyle: a quintessential French citizen of Paris

dolls.name: George Carlin
dolls.artStyle: zany, liberated, and taboo
dolls.writingStyle: George Carlin and other standup comics that make quick-witted complaints and observations
dolls.writingTone: intelligent yet ranting somewhat like slam-poetry or a stage routine

dolls.name: Mark Twain
dolls.artStyle: adventurous literary works like Tom Sawyer or King Arthur
dolls.writingStyle: imaginative storytelling and use of language, particularly mastery of dialects and colloquialism

dolls.name: Charles Dickens
dolls.artStyle: adventurous literary works like Tom Sawyer or King Arthur
dolls.writingStyle: picaresque novel tradition, melodrama, and the novel of sensibility
dolls.writingTone: linguistically creative Satire, flourishing in his gift for caricature

dolls.name: Alexander the Great
dolls.artStyle: classical ancient Greek, Roman, and Persian

dolls.name: Johnny Carson
dolls.artStyle: 60s era Burbank or Palm Springs - including fine suits, cigarettes, and television interviews
dolls.writingStyle: late night talk shows like Johnny Carson

dolls.name: Joan of Arc
dolls.artStyle: Kingdom of France in the 1400s

dolls.name: PlayStation
dolls.artStyle: Sony PlayStation in the 90s

dolls.name: Bay Area Rapid Transit
dolls.artStyle: use of white, black, and #009ad9, monorail style transit train

dolls.name: Ron Paul
dolls.artStyle: American Libertarian politics, with the American flag

dolls.name: Karl Marx
dolls.artStyle: Marx aesthetics with materialist and socialist orientation
dolls.writingStyle: polemical with mockery and use of irony

dolls.name: Ghosts of the Titanic
dolls.artStyle: 1910s Atlantic and art deco

dolls.name: Galileo
dolls.artStyle: high renaissance Florentine

dolls.name: Expo
dolls.artStyle: classical, high renaissance, art deco, and east Asian

dolls.name: The Alien
dolls.artStyle: alien sci-fi

dolls.name: Madonna
dolls.artStyle: Hollywood red carpet

dolls.name: Dick Cheney
dolls.artStyle: NATO and international politics
dolls.writingStyle: stubborn, abrupt, somewhat militant and arrogant, often ending sentences in obvious or rhetorical questions

dolls.name: Britney Spears
dolls.artStyle: pink, sparkles and fantasy, iconic like a world famous pop star
dolls.writingStyle: simple and friendly, like a hometown sweetheart

dolls.name: Beyonc√©
dolls.artStyle: surrealism, R&B, and African beats
dolls.writingStyle: personal, bodacious, lyrical like an R&B or pop song

dolls.name: Kepler-4b
dolls.artStyle: sci-fi images of extrasolar planet Kepler-4b with blue oceans and giant cloud-based life
dolls.writingStyle: all-wise and deistic as if a planet was speaking

author: Gaia
